name: eyecare-e-referrals-service
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.publish: mkdir -p build && node_modules/.bin/speccy resolve specification/eyecare-e-referrals-service.yaml -i | poetry run python scripts/yaml2json.py | poetry run python scripts/set_version.py > build/eyecare-e-referrals-service.json

author: NHS Digital
